original_text: One of the Pharisees asked Jesus to eat a meal with him. So Jesus went to the Pharisee's house and sat down to eat.
korean_text: 한 바리새인이 예수께 자기와 함께 잡수시기를 청하니 이에 바리새인의 집에 들어가 앉으셨을 때에

sentences.original_text: One of the Pharisees asked Jesus
to eat a meal with him
So Jesus went to the Pharisee's house
